meanings.sent1: Each individual has their own unique personality.
meanings.sent2: The teacher knows each individual student in the class.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends teased each individual playfully.
meanings.sent4: In a crowded city, each individual is like a tiny star in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The individual's kindness touched everyone around them.

meanings.sent1: She is an exceptional individual with great talent.
meanings.sent2: The individual you are looking for is wearing a red hat.
meanings.sent3: The detective questioned each individual at the crime scene.
meanings.sent4: As an individual, he stood out from the rest of the team.
meanings.sent5: The individual's smile brightened up the room.

meanings.sent1: Each flower in the garden has its individual beauty.
meanings.sent2: The company aims to treat each employee as an individual.
meanings.sent3: The individual characteristics of the painting made it stand out.
meanings.sent4: In a world of conformity, her individual style shone through.
meanings.sent5: The individual snowflakes sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a single person
meanings.sent1: She prefers individual study over group projects.
meanings.sent2: The artist's individual style is recognized worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The individual decision led to unexpected consequences.
meanings.sent4: His individual approach to problem-solving impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The individual effort put into the project paid off in the end.
